item.title: Trump, Vance defend Sydney Sweeney 'jeans' ad. Is she from Florida?
item.description: Six words many didn't think they'd ever see together: "American Eagle jeans" and "promotion of eugenics." Now, it's all anyone can talk about.

item.title: College football poll hot takes: SEC whips Big Ten in rankings, not playoff
item.description: After an offseason filled with interconferencepropaganda wars, thinlyveiled shotsandpublic sniping, the 67 coaches who vote in theUS LBM Coaches Pollgot to offer one last, private word on which conference is strongest.

item.title: IMG, American Heritage headline Florida teams on USA TODAY preseason Super 25
item.description: Five Florida teams cracked the preseasonUSA TOAY High School Sports Super 25 football poll.

item.title: What Billy Napier said about Florida football during 'critical week' of camp
item.description: Florida footballcoach Billy Napier was pleased with the intensity and effort theFlorida Gatorsshowed in their fifth practice of fall camp on August 4.

item.title: Will $2 ticket win you over $420 million? Check Monday, Aug. 4, Powerball
item.description: Will a$2 Powerball ticket make you a multimillionaire? As they say in the lottery business, “it could happen to you.”

item.title: Florida no stranger to August hurricanes. See how many…
item.description: Forecasters have been warning activity in the Atlantic basin will be picking up.

item.title: 3rd child dies from barge hitting sailboat near Miami…
item.description: Athird child has diedafter a barge collided with a youth club's sailing boat in Biscayne Bay off Miami Beach on July 28, officials said.

item.title: First daughter, new mom Tiffany Trump posts vacation…
item.description: New momTiffany Trump is back in the spotlight— and so is her baby. The first daughter, a first-time mom, posted photos of a family vacation.

item.title: My Safe Florida Home accepting applications again from…
item.description: Applications for My Safe Florida Home opened up again on Aug. 4, and Florida homeowners once again have a shot at getting help to harden their homes against storms, up to $10,000.

item.title: What qualifies as middle class in Florida? See the…
item.description: A massive influx of new residents made Florida one of themost popular U.S. states to moveto from 2021 through 2023. In 2022, it became the country’s fastest-growing state for the first time since 1957, according tothe U.S. Census Bureau.

item.title: Anti-Trump protests could keep Americans divided, angry
item.description: It is easy to appreciate the righteous anger that leads todemonstrationsagainst the policies of the current leadership of the United States.

item.title: YIGBY could help Sarasota County address affordable housing crisis
item.description: As Sarasota County policymakers and advocatessit down this fallto hash out bold approaches to the region's ongoing housing crisis, they’ll have a major new tool on the table – one that could help open hundreds of parcels of land owned by religious institutions.
